text.autoconfig.HEA.title: HideEMCAnnoyances Config
text.autoconfig.HEA.option.settings.enab: If set to false, the mod will do nothing
text.autoconfig.HEA.option.settings.hide: If set to true, messages from Michelle Obama will not be shown
If set to true, vote messages will not be shown
If set to true, kill messages will not be shown
text.autoconfig.HEA.option.settings.disc: If set to true, messages from Discord will not be shown
Comma separated string of rank names to filter, e.g. Mod,Staff Manager,Developer. Type * to filter all rank names.
Set to true to make filtered ranks an exclusive list, e.g.: Mod,Staff Manager,Developer will only show messages from those ranks.
